entries.abort: You have failed the mission because it was aborted.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The freighter has arrived, proceed to intercept.
entries.attack_notify: Enemy craft detected on attack vector.
entries.capture_phase_1_1: You are a fool to go against the Empire.
entries.capture_phase_1_3: You have signed your own death warrant
entries.capture_phase_2_1: Too late to turn back now fool
entries.capture_phase_2_2: Lead the way... to our doom
entries.capture_phase_2_3: The Empire approaches, our fall is eminent.
entries.complete_1: The freighter is away, good job.
entries.complete_2: One less imperial in the trade lanes
entries.escort_remaining: Escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remain.
entries.escort_wiped_out: All Escorting craft have been destroyed.
entries.failed_destroy: You have failed because the freighter was destroyed.
entries.failed_escape: You have failed because the freighter escaped.
entries.panic_2: You cannot be allowed to succeed.
entries.quest_disable_d: Target the crafts engines to disable them
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the target safely out of the system
entries.quest_location_d: An Imperial trade route in the Dantooine System
entries.quest_recover_d: Fly up near the target to begin the capture process
entries.taunt_1: Those who stand against the Empire will perish
entries.thanks_3: The resources of the Empire are limitless
entries.title: Dantooine System: Duty: Capture the Imperial Freighter
